channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [WFLY-47] Bundle undeploy does not remove storage state

item.summary: Bundle undeploy does not remove storage state

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
The UserBundleInstallService does this

    @Override
 
    public void stop(StopContext context) {
 
        BundleManagerPlugin bundleManager = getBundleManager();
 
        bundleManager.uninstallBundle(getBundleState(), Bundle.STOP_TRANSIENT);
 
    }

which skips the removal of the storage state.

See: Undeploy due to server shutdown vs. explicit undeploy operation
